file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-60-04-04 - DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The two digital temperature controllers are installed in the electronic compartment. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - ALL 21-60-04-000-801-A REMOVAL DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - ALL 21-60-04-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-60-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-60-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the digital temperature controller. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Below forward fuselage II D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breaker(s) below, as applicable, and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (them): – PACK 1 (LH digital temperature controller). – PACK 2 (RH digital temperature controller). (2) Open access panel 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector. (2) Remove the screws and washers. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-60-04 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the digital temperature controller. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-60-04 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Digital Temperature Controller - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B DTC 1 A ZONE DTC 2 123 124 DET. A 4. DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER 1. SCREW 2. WASHER DET. B 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 145AMM210040.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-60-04 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-60-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the digital temperature controller. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - TEMPERATURE CONTROL SYSTEM - OPERATION- AMM TASK 21-60-00-700-801-A/500 AL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Below forward fuselage II D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, make sure that the applicable circuit breaker(s) below is (are) open and with a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag attached to it (them): – PACK 1 (LH digital temperature controller). – PACK 2 (RH digital temperature controller). J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the digital temperature controller in the installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-60-04 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the washers and the screws. (3) Connect the electrical connector. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access panel 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breaker(s) below, as applicable, and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (them): – PACK 1 (LH digital temperature controller). – PACK 2 (RH digital temperature controller). (3) Do the Temperature Control System - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 21-60-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-60-04 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
